column4: Gas producer Cabot cuts full-year production outlook
column5: Oct 7 (Reuters) - Natural gas producer Cabot Oil & Gas Corp on Wednesday cut its full-year production outlook and said it would continue to evaluate options including temporarily forgoing production as gas prices remain weak.
column6: Cabot now expects full-year production of 2.33 billion cubic feet per day (bcfpd) to 2.34 bcfpd, lower than its previous estimate of 2.35 bcfpd to 2.38 bcfpd. (Reporting by Arathy S Nair in Bengaluru; Editing by Devika Syamnath)

column5: (Reuters) - Specialty chemicals company Cabot Corp CBT.N said on Monday it was withdrawing its fiscal 2020 earnings forecast amid the coronavirus pandemic.
column6: The company said it was also exploring ways to reduce capital expenditures and had put a hold on any near-term share buyback plans.
column7: “We are taking swift action to better align our cost structure and working capital needs to the near-term demand patterns,” Chief Executive Officer Sean Keohane said in a statement.
